name: ROYAL MELBOURNE INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY
about: The Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology (RMIT) Aviation Academy is a leading institution in aviation education, training, and research. With over 80 years of experience, RMIT offers comprehensive flight training programs, including the Associate Degree in Aviation and the Bachelor of Aviation (Pilot Training). Students learn to fly in single- and multi-engine aircraft and prepare for CASA Commercial Pilot Licence tests. The academy is based at the historic RAAF Williams base and boasts the largest owned fleet in Australian higher education. RMIT's programs combine theory and practical experience, equipping students with problem-solving, communication, and leadership skills, preparing them for careers as professional pilots. The academy is committed to inspiring, educating, and cultivating a proficient global aviation workforce.
services:
["Associate Degree in Aviation (Professional Pilots)
Bachelor of Applied Science (Aviation)
Bachelor of Applied Science (Aviation)/Bachelor of Business
Bachelor of Aviation (Pilot Training)
PhD (Aerospace Engineering and Aviation)"]
